Name: Huapala
Ingredients: 22.5 ml Light white rum (charcoal-filtered 1-4 years old)
10 ml Chilled water omit if using wet ice
2 drop Saline solution 4:1 (20g sea salt to 80g water) optional
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of lemon wedge &/or lemon zest twist.
Review: In his book, Vic prefaces this cocktail with the comment, "Nice, easy drink". It's basically a lemon Daiquiri with gin and grenadine.
History: Adapted from a recipe in Victor Bergeron 's 1972 Trader Vic's Bartender's Guide where this recipe is accompanied by the "TV" logo indicating that this recipe is a Trader Vic original.
Nutrition: One serving of Huapala contains 128 calories
